file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
---
openapi: 3.0.2
info:
  title: SWatch Producer AWS Internal API
  version: 1.0.0
  description: "Provides AWS with billing details based on TallySummary"
  contact:
    url: https://github.com/RedHatInsights/rhsm-subscriptions
paths:
  /internal/aws/tally_summary:
    post:
      summary: Send `TallySummary` usage data to AWS.
      requestBody:
        description: A given `TallySummary` to have usage data forwarded to AWS.
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '../../../../swatch-core/schemas/tally_summary.yaml'
        required: false
      responses:
        '202':
          description: "TallySummary queued for sending to AWS."
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        '403':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Forbidden'
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ResourceNotFound'
        '500':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
      operationId: submitTallySummary
      description: Only available when `AWS_MANUAL_SUBMISSION_ENABLED=true`
components:
  responses:
    InternalServerError:
      description: "An internal server error has occurred and is not recoverable."
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Errors"
    BadRequest:
      description: "The server could could not process the current request."
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Errors"
    Forbidden:
      description: "The request was valid, but the request was refused by the server."
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Errors"
    ResourceNotFound:
      description: "The requested resource was not found."
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Errors"
    ServiceUnavailable:
      description: "The server is currently unavailable."
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Errors"
  schemas:
    Errors:
      required:
        - errors
      properties:
        errors:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
    Error:
      required:
        - status
        - code
        - title
      properties:
        status:
          type: string
        code:
          type: string
        title:
          type: string
        detail:
          type: string

Error: parse: parse spec: paths: /internal/aws/tally_summary: post: operation "submitTallySummary": requestBody: content: "application/json": parse schema: parse schema: resolve "../../../../swatch-core/schemas/tally_summary.yaml": find schema: external base "../../../../swatch-core/schemas/tally_summary.yaml" is not supported
